creator: robert.flaherty@oracle.com
text: Because this task only rewrites the target names and their occurrence in "depends", it violates the documentation of "This makes the included file self-contained."

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: I'm afraid we need to update the documentation in that case. It might be possible to rewrite the target in <antcall> but things will become a whole lot more complex for <ant> or <subant>. And things don't stop there, there may be lots of other tasks that use targets as attributes - ant-contrib's <antcallback> or <runtarget> tasks, for example - and we can't promise to make the file self-contained in light of tasks we don't know.
